BRIDGE.name: Bridge of the Enterprise
BRIDGE.desc: You are stadning on the bridge of the Enterprise. Lt. commander Data is at Ops, and Wesley has the helm. Mr. Worf is barking something about Romulans, blah blah blah.

READYROOM.name: Captain's Ready Room
READYROOM.desc: You are in the captain's ready room. Captain PIcard is seated behind his desk, sipping an Earl Gray tea, hot

items.desc: A Type 1 phaser is on the captain's desk
items.take: You take the phaser while the captain isn't looking and slip it into your pocket... Oh wait your unifrom doesn't have pockets.
